original_text: Now when Elisha had fallen sick with the illness of which he was to die, Joash king of Israel went down to him and wept before him, crying, “My father, my father! The chariots of Israel and its horsemen!”
korean_text: 엘리사가 죽을 병이 들매 이스라엘의 왕 요아스가 그에게로 내려와 자기의 얼굴에 눈물을 흘리며 이르되 내 아버지여 내 아버지여 이스라엘의 병거와 마병이여 하매

sentences.original_text: Now when Elisha had fallen sick
with the illness of which he was to die
Joash king of Israel went down to him
The chariots of Israel and its horsemen!
